Key Match Events: Peña capped a five-run outburst in the sixth inning by hitting a three-run homer to right-center field, which put Houston up, 10-4.
Post-Match Reflections: Every Astros starter either had a hit or scored a run Saturday, helping Houston to its sixth consecutive win at Minute Maid Park.
The Astros improved to 7-0 in games started by Yusei Kikuchi, who was acquired from the Blue Jays at the Trade Deadline.
Miscellaneous Highlights: McCormick has started five consecutive games since returning from his brief stint in Triple-A.
McCormick is 6-for-18 with a double and looks and feels more comfortable at the plate.
If he can keep that up the rest of the month and into October, that’s a huge development for the AL West-leading Astros.
